226.description: BBC Turns Off CEEFAX Service After 38 Years: Kittenman writes "After 38 years (1974 - 2012) the BBC's CEEFAX ser...

227.description: BBC Turns Off CEEFAX Service After 38 Years: Kittenman writes "After 38 years (1974 - 2012) the BBC's CEEFAX ser...  Kittenman writes "After 38 years (1974 - 2012) the BBC's CEEFAX service has ceased transmission. The service gave on-line up-to-date textual information (albeit in condensed form) to TV viewers in the pre-Internet era and afterwards. Its final broadcast signed off with, 'Goodbye, cruel world.' 245.description: Ceefax RT @DivyaReports: BBC pulls plug on world's oldest teletext service

246.description: Ceefax RT @DivyaReports: BBC pulls plug on world's oldest teletext service   BBC Ceefax, the world's first teletext service, ceased transmission on Tuesday after delivering 38 years of up-to-the-minute news and sports updates to the British public.

247.description: "Ceefax service closes after 38 years on BBC":

248.description: Ireland's digital switchover takes place - goodbye analogue TV network

249.description: Ireland's digital switchover takes place - goodbye analogue TV network    Ireland's digital switchover has taken place, with a digital signal in line with the rest of Europe having replaced the analogue TV network in a move Pat Rabbitte, TD, Ireland's Minister for Communications, Energy and Natural Resources, referred to as "the dawn of the digital broadcasting era" for Ireland. Ireland's digital switchover takes place - goodbye analogue TV network
